CAR-O9 is closed CAR 10 ER Calculation Sheet: Monthly net electricity export values | mentioned in the ER calculation are not | consistent with the respective JMR | values. The JMR has to be seen along with the | electricity share certificate provided by the O&M contractor (who is also a part | of PPA and authorised to provide | share certificate of electricity to the project. The method which is adopted | to apportion the electricity is described | in the revised MR section 3.3 and the same calculation is included in the revised ER spread sheet as well. Now the share certificate along with | JMR is provided for verification. The electricity export & import values given in the ER calculation | sheet is now consistent with the values calculated in the share certificate. | CAR-10 is closed.
